CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
CurrentVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
OldVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Use double-key encryption to protect your most sensitive files and emails in Microsoft 365 Apps on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,To protect your most sensitive content, users of Microsoft 365 Apps can now use Double Key Encryption (DKE) for files and emails using the built-in labeling client. With DKE, Microsoft stores one key in Microsoft Azure and you hold the other key, ensuring that only you can ever decrypt protected content, under all circumstances. Sensitivity labels configured with DKE in Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal are now available for users in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook to publish or consume content protected with DKE.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Use double-key encryption to protect your most sensitive files and emails in Microsoft 365 Apps on Windows
OldVersion.description: ,To protect your most sensitive content, users of Microsoft 365 Apps can now use Double Key Encryption (DKE) for files and emails using the built-in labeling client. With DKE, Microsoft stores one key in Microsoft Azure and you hold the other key, ensuring that only you can ever decrypt protected content, under all circumstances. Sensitivity labels configured with DKE in Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal are now available for users in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook to publish or consume content protected with DKE.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users, and German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings). Note: We have updated the Release Phase to show the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.description: ,The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The release phase has been updated to show current standing.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the view, download, and delete experience of Teams meeting transcript files
CurrentVersion.description: We are streamlining the storage of meeting transcript files. Starting with this feature, all meeting transcript entry points in Teams app will point to the OneDrive for Business copy only. The rollout of this feature also improves the delete experience of the transcript for meeting organizers. Now, when a meeting organizer or co-organizer deletes the transcript in the Microsoft Teams app, this will delete both copies of the transcript (from OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online) at the same time. If the meeting organizer deletes the transcript from Stream, only the copy in OneDrive for Business will be deleted. At a later date to be announced, meeting transcripts will stop saving in Exchange Online altogether and all transcript storage will be standardized on OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
OldVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Generic Wired Headsets on Android
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on Walkie Talkie.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Generic Wired Headsets on Android
OldVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on Walkie Talkie.

,With this update, any SOC analyst with the required customer-determined permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the user entity investigation experience in Microsoft Defender. This feature can help SOC analysts gain insider risk context for a specific user and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms is a new feature that enables users to create forms and customize themes with ease and speed. With this feature, you can describe the form you need in natural language, and Copilot will generate a form based on your description. You can preview the form and refine it as needed. After that, you can get suggested themes to uplift your form that encourages more engagement from the audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Give feedback for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Help button includes a Give feedback option that lets users share their opinions and ideas about Teams Rooms with Microsoft. We use this feedback to improve the Teams experience. IT admins can enable or disable this feature for users and manage feedback policies using PowerShell.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded incoming call setting options for Teams Phone Mobile users
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Phone Mobile users will now the flexibility to choose whether group calls, calls received as part of a call queue, and meeting nudges are received natively on their mobile phone or in the Teams app. This new capability enables greater flexibility and mobility and allows users to easily move these calls between their native dialer or the Teams app without interruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User reported events in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: When an end user reports an issue from a Teams Rooms device, a feedback event is raised in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal. This event provides managers with the necessary data to act on the feedback or open a support case with logs that were generated by the end user. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated work hours and location experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: This update brings a new look with the daily peek: click on your work location icon at the top of your calendar to change your work location, view who else will be in the office, or receive suggestions to help optimize your work day. This feature will come to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Your work location will reflect across Microsoft 365, such as in Teams and your profile card. You can also update your location from Teams which will stay in sync with Outlook. We are also introducing a new location type, out-of-office, which will automatically sync with your out-of-office calendar appointments. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.description: This will enhance the Windows compliance policy - device health by adding five additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, firmware protection, virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Heading levels for web parts
CurrentVersion.description: When authoring pages, this will create the ability to choose heading level for webparts to help define the hierarchy of information on a page.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections news notifications on desktop
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections mobile will also be available in Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View hidden files and folders in 'Shared with you' view
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to view files and folders you have hidden in the “Shared with you” view in OneDrive for Web. You can quickly access files and folders you have hidden by clicking on the 'Hidden' button in the filter bar. You can also 'Unhide' files and bring them back to the 'Shared with you' view.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted and FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder tags on items in Search Folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search Folders will now display a folder tag within the message list, indicating the folder to which each email belongs. This enhancement provides users with quick and easy access to contextual information, improving navigation and organization within their mailbox. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
CurrentVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Use double-key encryption to protect your most sensitive files and emails in Microsoft 365 Apps on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,To protect your most sensitive content, users of Microsoft 365 Apps can now use Double Key Encryption (DKE) for files and emails using the built-in labeling client. With DKE, Microsoft stores one key in Microsoft Azure and you hold the other key, ensuring that only you can ever decrypt protected content, under all circumstances. Sensitivity labels configured with DKE in Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal are now available for users in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook to publish or consume content protected with DKE.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
CurrentVersion.description:
Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Office documents have a new default theme
CurrentVersion.description:
,
A new default theme is coming to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook across your endpoints. The new theme will include the new default font, Aptos, a new color palette, and updated default line weights.  Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Rolling Out.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand. Note: We will not be rolling out to Government Clouds at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: @ mentions within comments
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to @ mention users within comments on a whiteboard, with the associated in-app indicators to inform users of an @ mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Schedule a Viva Pulse request to be resent
CurrentVersion.description: Schedule and resend pulses to get periodic feedback from your team members.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users, and German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: From the new Outlook for Windows, open Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments in desktop apps
CurrentVersion.description: From the new Outlook for Windows, users can now open Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments in their respective desktop apps by double clicking them.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Updates experience migrates into Browser Essentials
CurrentVersion.description: Getting alerts on available Edge Updates will come from Browser Essentials instead of the Settings page for better visibility and experience.

Add Online Archive for Shared Mailboxes in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
CurrentVersion.description:
,
When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for iOS Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for iOS Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings). Note: We have updated the Release Phase to show the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The release phase has been updated to show current standing.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Admin apps pinned by default in Mail Compose and Read
CurrentVersion.description: When an app is deployed in Integrated Apps (Get Apps & Upload Custom LOB apps) in the Microsoft Admin Center, it will be available in Outlook on the web in Read Message Actions and Compose Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the view, download, and delete experience of Teams meeting transcript files
CurrentVersion.description: We are streamlining the storage of meeting transcript files. Starting with this feature, all meeting transcript entry points in Teams app will point to the OneDrive for Business copy only. The rollout of this feature also improves the delete experience of the transcript for meeting organizers. Now, when a meeting organizer or co-organizer deletes the transcript in the Microsoft Teams app, this will delete both copies of the transcript (from OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online) at the same time. If the meeting organizer deletes the transcript from Stream, only the copy in OneDrive for Business will be deleted. At a later date to be announced, meeting transcripts will stop saving in Exchange Online altogether and all transcript storage will be standardized on OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Generic Wired Headsets on Android
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on Walkie Talkie.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider risk context in Microsoft Defender user entity page
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, any SOC analyst with the required customer-determined permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the user entity investigation experience in Microsoft Defender. This feature can help SOC analysts gain insider risk context for a specific user and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections for Frontline workers
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Track usage of your frontline teams and apps in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Track usage across all your frontline teams deployed via DTAS (Deploy Teams at Scale) and frontline apps like Shifts, Tasks, Walkie Talkie in the Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Copilot in Forms empowers you to create and customize forms with ease and speed
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms is a new feature that enables users to create forms and customize themes with ease and speed. With this feature, you can describe the form you need in natural language, and Copilot will generate a form based on your description. You can preview the form and refine it as needed. After that, you can get suggested themes to uplift your form that encourages more engagement from the audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Sticky Note Visual Refresh
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the visuals of the sticky note feature in Whiteboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Working hours and location
CurrentVersion.description: ,Roadmap item 378774 was an accidentally created duplicate entry.  It is being moved to cancelled.  All updates for this feature will be posted through roadmap item 383721.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Give feedback for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Help button includes a Give feedback option that lets users share their opinions and ideas about Teams Rooms with Microsoft. We use this feedback to improve the Teams experience. IT admins can enable or disable this feature for users and manage feedback policies using PowerShell.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded incoming call setting options for Teams Phone Mobile users
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Phone Mobile users will now the flexibility to choose whether group calls, calls received as part of a call queue, and meeting nudges are received natively on their mobile phone or in the Teams app. This new capability enables greater flexibility and mobility and allows users to easily move these calls between their native dialer or the Teams app without interruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User reported events in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: When an end user reports an issue from a Teams Rooms device, a feedback event is raised in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal. This event provides managers with the necessary data to act on the feedback or open a support case with logs that were generated by the end user. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Right preview pane in the single line view aka column layout
CurrentVersion.description: Adding support to show the reading pane in the right when user selects column view.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Updated Home page
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, users can configure their personal booking page from the Bookings home page itself.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Collapsible Date Headers on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: You now can collapse and expand the date headers in the Message List when you've chosen "Show date headers in the message list" in your Settings. Collapse all emails from "This week" to quickly get to the rest of the emails from "This month."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
CurrentVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated work hours and location experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: This update brings a new look with the daily peek: click on your work location icon at the top of your calendar to change your work location, view who else will be in the office, or receive suggestions to help optimize your work day. This feature will come to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Your work location will reflect across Microsoft 365, such as in Teams and your profile card. You can also update your location from Teams which will stay in sync with Outlook. We are also introducing a new location type, out-of-office, which will automatically sync with your out-of-office calendar appointments. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated work hours and location experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: This update brings a new look with the daily peek: click on your work location icon at the top of your calendar to change your work location, view who else will be in the office, or receive suggestions to help optimize your work day. This feature will come to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Your work location will reflect across Microsoft 365, such as in Teams and your profile card. You can also update your location from Teams which will stay in sync with Outlook. We are also introducing a new location type, out-of-office, which will automatically sync with your out-of-office calendar appointments. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings now available on mobile after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: In addition to accessing Copilot in Teams during a meeting on mobile devices (available now), you can now access Copilot in Teams and ask questions about eligible meetings after the meeting ends on mobile devices.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Creators and recipients can view, track, and sign their SharePoint eSignature requests in Approvals in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can track their SharePoint eSignature requests in the Approvals app in Teams. Users will be notified about new requests, updated about ongoing requests, and will be able to initiate signing within their flow of work in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
CurrentVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
CurrentVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed attestation - enhanced for Windows 11
CurrentVersion.description: This will enhance the Windows compliance policy - device health by adding five additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, firmware protection, virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Heading levels for web parts
CurrentVersion.description: When authoring pages, this will create the ability to choose heading level for webparts to help define the hierarchy of information on a page.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections news notifications on desktop
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections mobile will also be available in Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View hidden files and folders in 'Shared with you' view
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to view files and folders you have hidden in the “Shared with you” view in OneDrive for Web. You can quickly access files and folders you have hidden by clicking on the 'Hidden' button in the filter bar. You can also 'Unhide' files and bring them back to the 'Shared with you' view.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted and FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder tags on items in Search Folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search Folders will now display a folder tag within the message list, indicating the folder to which each email belongs. This enhancement provides users with quick and easy access to contextual information, improving navigation and organization within their mailbox. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings
